title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: Note that part of this plan is based on Trump getting to House Speaker position. Since McKarthy was just voted into that position, it seems that Trump won't be there. But...One of the concessions (compromises) Mckarthy had to make to get in was,Quote from: https://www.zerohedge.com/political/here-are-concessions-mccarthy-had-make-speakership...1. As has been reported, it will only take a single congressperson, acting in what is known as a Jeffersonian Motion, to move to remove the Speaker if he or she goes back on their word or policy agenda....So, McKarthy can be replaced if he goofs.President Donald J. Trump Announces Plan to Destroy the Drug Cartelshttps://globalwarming-arclein.blogspot.com/2023/01/president-donald-j-trump-announces-plan.htmlJoe Biden has spent the last two years dismantling the southern border. Biden’s Open Borders policies are killing innocent Americans, ravaging American communities, enriching the cartels, and destabilizing large parts of Mexico and Latin America.Since Joe Biden took office, an estimated 200,000+ Americans have died from drug overdoses.Hundreds of thousands of pounds of ultra-lethal fentanyl, heroin, meth, cocaine, and other illicit narcotics are pouring across our wide-open border and into American communities. Federal officials estimate that they only seize up to 10% of these drugs.Enough fentanyl was seized at the border last year to kill every single American.Biden inherited the strongest border in U.S. history, and turned it into the greatest border disaster in the history of the world....

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on January 08, 2023, 06:20:49 PMNote that part of this plan is based on Trump getting to House Speaker position. Since McKarthy was just voted into that position, it seems that Trump won't be there. But...One of the concessions (compromises) Mckarthy had to make to get in was,Quote from: https://www.zerohedge.com/political/here-are-concessions-mccarthy-had-make-speakership...1. As has been reported, it will only take a single congressperson, acting in what is known as a Jeffersonian Motion, to move to remove the Speaker if he or she goes back on their word or policy agenda....So, McKarthy can be replaced if he goofs.President Donald J. Trump Announces Plan to Destroy the Drug Cartelshttps://globalwarming-arclein.blogspot.com/2023/01/president-donald-j-trump-announces-plan.htmlJoe Biden has spent the last two years dismantling the southern border. Biden’s Open Borders policies are killing innocent Americans, ravaging American communities, enriching the cartels, and destabilizing large parts of Mexico and Latin America.Since Joe Biden took office, an estimated 200,000+ Americans have died from drug overdoses.Hundreds of thousands of pounds of ultra-lethal fentanyl, heroin, meth, cocaine, and other illicit narcotics are pouring across our wide-open border and into American communities. Federal officials estimate that they only seize up to 10% of these drugs.Enough fentanyl was seized at the border last year to kill every single American.Biden inherited the strongest border in U.S. history, and turned it into the greatest border disaster in the history of the world....This drug is not only ravaging Americans but it is also killing in my country. My fear now is that they have started building and operating secret factories in my country. Joe Biden messed up the US borders when it abolished some vibrant policies of the Trump Administration leading to the high influx of drug traffickers. The war against fentanyl is not an easy fight because some superpowers are benefitting from the trade. China is the major producers of the chemicals that are used to produce the killer drug. In Mexico, the Sinaloa and Jalisco drug cartels are so powerful and popular that arresting a member could lead to violent or even deadly protests.Joe Biden should continue with the Trump border walls, review the country's immigration policies, open the border to viable immigrants and strengthen the Border Guide operations.

comments.author: montaga
comments.body: All he needs to do is legalize drugs and issue is solved. No marked, no cartels, no police work, no overpopulated prisons and less tax* money spend on the "war" on drugs.  (* oh forgot all about he did no pay any, no does not know what it means)Secondary it is not his business anyway what someone smokes, eats, drinks, injects or otherwise mutilates his own body.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: ^^^ Absolutely true!!! But there is more. Government needs to up its advertising about the destructive qualities of using drugs. We need 5x the number of advertisements against drugs. In addition, government needs to get out of helping drug victims, and get away from leniency when a drug user damages someone or his property. The funds saved can easily be used for the advertising.Let the families of the drug users help them, or the churches.
